items.text: length on off, defended
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball on leg stump, flicked off the pads through backward square
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: short, angled across, waits and stabs with an open face through backward of point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off, pushed out through point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle, carefully blocks to cover
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: short of a length, tucked through midwicket
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: overpitched outside off, nicely drawing the batsman forward, and Sarkar responds by throwing his weight behind it for a picture-perfect cover drive
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: advances down the ground and gets a bottom edge on a forced pull as the bowler drags the length back
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on off, drops it through extra cover for a quick one
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: short ball, barely ducks, and expectedly called a wide
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, 2 wides

items.text: short of a length on off and middle, tucked through square leg
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: dipping fuller ball outside off, squeezed out to cover
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length outside off, takes a stride across and blocks to mid-on
items.postText: Bangladesh take the first Powerplay with a rush of boundaries. Debayan's back for a short stint.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Thanks Akshay. What a rollicking start for Bangladesh. Spin for the first time today, as Sikandar Raza comes into the attack.
items.text: cut away, but straight to the man at point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: pitched up, he waits on it and drives it down to the cover fielder for one
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Tafser: "BANGLADESH will be in a sweet trouble as all 3 partners of Tamim Iqbal are performing equally well"
items.text: driven on the on side, but straight to short midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: width on offer, but Sarkar doesn't connect well with the cut. Underedge that goes down to short third man.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: cut hard and the sweeper does well to keep it down to just the single. Neverthless, what a quick start this has been!
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: punches this through the offside, again to the sweeper, to retain the strike
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Khaled wants to know if Bangladesh lost their review after the first over. Not the case, as it was umpire's call. Wellington Masakadza into the attack now
items.text: tucked away on the leg for a single
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: seemed to be trying a variation with the ball but dragged it short. Drop-kicked towards the square-leg fence, but along the ground
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: taken on the full and driven, but can't pierce the infield on the off side
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: good bit of work by short midwicket, as he intercepts an attempted flick
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: driven down to long on after taking a couple of steps closer to the pitch of the ball
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: drives it straight past the bowler, and long on has to do the cleaning up
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run
